articles.title: Federal immigration officers shoot and wound 2 people in Portland, Oregon, authorities say
articles.description:
The Department of Homeland Security described the vehicle's passenger as “a Venezuelan illegal alien affiliated with the transnational Tren de Aragua prostitution ring” who had been involved in a recent shooting in Portland.

The post Federal immigration officers shoot and wound 2 people in Portland, Oregon, authorities say appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: House passes bill to extend health care subsidies in defiance of GOP leaders
articles.description:
Forcing the issue to a vote came about after a handful of Republicans signed on to a so-called “discharge petition” to unlock debate, bypassing objections from House Speaker Mike Johnson.

The post House passes bill to extend health care subsidies in defiance of GOP leaders appeared first on Boston.com.
